title: Disney Infinity: Gold Collection – 1.0 + 2.0 + 3.0
body:
Disney Infinity: Gold Collection – 1.0 + 2.0 + 3.0


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Open world, Sandbox, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Avalanche Software, Disney Interactive Studios
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI8
Original Size: 27.7 GB
Repack Size: from 14 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent / Kickass Torrents [magnet] [.torrent file only] MULTI8
  • FreeTorrents ENG/RUS
  • Tapochek.net [magnet] ENG/RUS
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) MULTI8

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on three ISO releases: Disney.Infinity.1.0.Gold.Edition-PLAZA (8,593,342,464 bytes), Disney.Infinity.2.0.Gold.Edition-PLAZA (7,960,592,384 bytes) & Disney.Infinity.3.0.Gold.Edition-PLAZA (13,093,502,976 bytes)
  • Disney.Infinity.1.0.Gold.Edition.Update.v20161216-PLAZA, Disney.Infinity.2.0.Gold.Edition.Update.v20161216-PLAZA & Disney.infinity.3.0.Gold.Edition.Update.v20161216-PLAZA patches applied
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation (when all languages are installed)
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature – you can skip downloading and installing languages you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 27.7 to 14~14.2 GB for any single language)
  • Installation takes 1-2 hours (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 33 GB (~36 GB during installation)
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in particular game folders to change the games language
  • Thanks to Spider91 from R.G. Mechanics for provided tools, used in DI3 recompression

Game Description

Disney Infinity 1.0: Gold Edition gives you the freedom and endless opportunity to create stories and play experiences with all Disney Infinity 1.0 Characters and Play Sets Unlocked and ready for you to mix, match and mash up to invent just about any adventure you can imagine.

All Disney Infinity 1.0 Playsets Unlocked:
– The Incredibles
– Pirates of the Carribean
– Toy Story in Space
– Cars
– And More…

All Disney Infinity 1.0 Characters Unlocked:
– Anna & Elsa
– Lightning McQueen
– Captain Jack Sparrow
– Buzz Lightyear
– Jack Skellington
– Sorcerer’s Apprentice Mickey
– And More…

Heroes and Villains. Sorcerers and Superheroes. Princesses and Pirates. For generations, Disney storytelling and Marvel adventures have sparked our imaginations with characters and worlds of magic, action and wonder. Now, Disney Infinity 2.0: Gold Edition invites you to enter those worlds with all Disney Infinity 2.0 Characters and Playsets Unlocked for to fully enjoy in game experiences only Disney, Marvel – and your imagination – can bring to life.

All Disney Infinity 2.0 Playsets Unlocked:
– Avengers
– Spider-Man
– Guardians of the Galaxy

All Disney Infinity 2.0 Characters Unlocked:
– Hulk
– Iron Man
– Black Widow
– Captain America
– Groot & Rocket Raccoon
– Donald Duck
– Aladdin
– All Disney Infinity 1.0 Characters
– And More…

Disney Infinity 3.0: Gold Edition includes Star Wars™ to the ever-growing collection of Marvel, Disney and Disney•Pixar characters, stories and worlds NOW with all Disney Infinity Characters and Playsets Unlocked. Together new heroes can join forces with all other Disney Infinity characters and embark on adventures as big as your imagination in the 3.0 Toy Box! Disney Infinity encourages you to play your way, whether you explore open-world creation in the Toy Box or story-driven gameplay inside Play Sets!

All Disney Infinity 3.0 Playsets Unlocked:
– Twilight of the Republic
– Rise Against the Empire
– The Force Awakens
– And More…

All Disney Infinity 3.0 Characters Unlocked:
– Rey
– Yoda
– Chewbacca
– Han Solo
– Darth Vader
– Hulkbuster
– Ultron
– Iron Man
– Olaf
– All Disney Infinity 1.0 Characters
– All Disney Infinity 2.0 Characters
– And More…

Enjoy Disney Infinity with a Full Toy Box!

  • No, you can’t install the games separately, they are bundled for better compression
  • No, you can’t play in Windowed or Borderless Window mode, also the resolution choices are limited
  • No, you can’t combine GUI/text from one language with voiceovers from other
  • Russian support is included only in DI2; Dutch & Polish support – only in DI3, Portuguese-Brazil is not included in DI3; English, German, Spanish, French supported in all three games

You can skip downloading of language files you don’t need. Here is the list of selective files:

  • setup-fitgirl-selective-brazilian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-dutch.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-english.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-french.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-german.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-polish.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-russian.bin
  • setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download setup-fitgirl-selective-spanish.bin & all main files (01-09).
